comment: I enjoy using Google Photos overall, but there is room for improvement. One feature I would like to see added is the ability to view all the folders I've got my photos organized in, and the ability to sort the folders in alphabetical order. I can get to my photos via the "Library", but I can't the folders are not sorry in alphabetical order. So I have to scroll through the list until I find the folder I'm looking for. It would also be good to be able to sort them in selectable date order.
scenarios: Navigate to the "Library" to view photos, but the folders are not sorted in alphabetical order, requiring the user to scroll through the list to find a specific folder.
Sort folders in selectable date order.
key sentence: Sort folders in selectable date order.
the function of activity: This activity allows users to navigate to library/memories/search, cast content, back up photos, favorite items, and access various editing and sharing options.
the sub-task list of state: [{'name': 'Library Page', 'description': 'Access library page.'}, {'name': 'View floder of backup pictures', 'description': 'View backup pictures in floder camera.'}, {'name': 'View Favorite floder', 'description': 'View Favorite floder'}, {'name': 'View Archive floder', 'description': 'View archive floder'}, {'name': 'View Locked floder', 'description': 'View locked floder'}, {'name': 'View Trash floder', 'description': 'View Trash floder'}, {'name': 'Create new album', 'description': 'Create a new album for organizing photos'}, {'name': 'Share album', 'description': 'Share an album with others'}, {'name': 'Delete album', 'description': 'Delete an existing album'}, {'name': 'Sort albums', 'description': 'Sort albums based on different criteria (e.g., date, name)'}, {'name': 'Account settings', 'description': 'Access and manage account settings'}]
